trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around November 15th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsi had just waken up when i had first seen something in the sky it looked like a black and white sphere (i took a photo at this time) and then it descended towards me extremely quickly and hovered about at necks hight for a min or 2, it was about 4 feet in diameter it began to float to the ground while humming. after it had landed a odd symbol appeared i tryied to take a pic of it at this time but my phone was not working correctly. it made another sound that sounded like talking i couldn't understand it then, then i touched the symbol it was colder than ice the last thing i remember is being pushed by something and then being extremely tired and then i woke up 2 hours later and i cant seem to get these thought out of my mind,there are only 4 there were these small pebbles that were to be inserted into living animals, there were little obsidian ball that exploded and there was seemed like a spherical television that held organs, and the chatter i heard before i can say for certan what exactly it said but i i know it d something to do with human population. during the entire experience i was relatively calm it almost felt like i knew what it was, like an old friend i first belived it to be a childs balloon he had discarded. sombody please see this i think this may be something that needs to be looked into.
Summary: first i saw it in the sky then irt came to me i touched it it pushed me back i fell and 2 hours later i wake up with numbers and a strag
